prefsnologintext2: Tinokumbira muzvizarurise kuti mukwanise kushandura zvisarudzo zvenyu.
passwordtooshort: Zvizaruriso zvinofanhira kunge zvine {{PLURAL:$1|vara rechi1| mavara ma$1}}.
passwordtoolong: Zvizaruriso hazvifanhire kurebesa kupfuura {{PLURAL:$1|vara rechi1| mavara ma$1}}.
password-substring-username-match: Chizaruriso chako hachifanhiri kuonekwa muzitamushando rako.
prefs-changeemail: Shandura kana bvisa kero ye tsambambozha
allowemail: Bvumidza vamwe vashandisi kuti vanditumire tsambambozha
tog-ccmeonemails: Nditumirei zvenza zvetsambambozha dzandinotumira vamwe vashandisi
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Nditumirei tsambambozha panoshandurwa zanhi kana fayera riri pazvandakarinda zvangu
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Nditumirei tsambambozha panoshandurwa zanhi rangu rokuereketa
tog-enotifminoredits: Nditumirei tsambambozha futi pakaitwa zvichinjirudzo zvidoko zvemazanhi ne mafayera
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Rakidzai kero yangu yetsambambozha mutsambambozha dzezviziviso
tog-useeditwarning: Ndiyambire pandinosiya zanhi rekuchinjirudza ndisina kuchengetedza zvishanduro
tog-uselivepreview: Rakidza chipandwa usina kuraichisa zanhi pekare
tog-usenewrc: Zvishanduko zveboka zvichienderana nezanhi muzvabva kushandukwa uye zvandakarinda
prefs-editwatchlist-edit: Ringa uye bvisa matumidzo kubva pazvandakarinda zvako
tog-extendwatchlist: Tandavadza zvandakarinda kurakidza zvishanduro zve, kwete zvichangobviro itwa basi
tog-watchlisthideanons: Viga zvichinjirudzo zvevashandisi vasingazivikanwe kubva pazvandakarinda
tog-watchlisthideliu: Viga zvichinjirudzo zvevashandisi vakazararuriswa kubva pazvandakarinda
tog-watchdefault: Wedzera mazanhi ne mafayera andinochinjirudza kuzvandakarinda zvangu
tog-watchmoves: Wedzera mazanhi ne mafayera andinochichinura kuzvandakarinda zvangu
tog-watchdeletion: Wedzera mazanhi ne mafayera andinobharanura kuzvandakarinda zvangu
tog-watchcreations: Wedzera mazanhi andinosika ne mafayera andinoisa kuzvandakarinda zvangu
tog-watchuploads: Wedzera mafayera matsva andinoisa kuzvandakarinda zvangu
tog-watchrollback: Wedzerai mazanhi andakaita zvokudzoseredza kuzvandakarinda zvangu
prefs-reset-confirm: Hongu, ndinodaka kugadzira zvisarudzo zvangu pekare.
